generated_body: The article titled "Cowboys have questionable red zone calls in loss to Vikings" is likely to analyze the strategic decisions made by the Dallas Cowboys during their recent game against the Minnesota Vikings, particularly focusing on their performance in the red zone. Readers may expect insights into specific plays that were criticized, as well as commentary from analysts or coaches regarding the effectiveness of these calls. The piece might also discuss the implications of these decisions for the team's overall performance and their standing in the league. It is possible that the article will highlight contrasting strategies employed by the Vikings and how they capitalized on the Cowboys' errors in this crucial area of the game.
